title: Psychoacoustic and Psychovisual Tests
settings-staticurl: (relative or absolute) URL to static files
settings-remoteurl: (relative or absolute) URL to remote files
archive: move to archive, will not appear in lists anymore, can be recovered
static-file: static, can edit and save only locally, it's possible to copy

settings.title: Settings
settings.editing: Editing selected item, submit or cancel.

button-upload-title: Upload file with test from local computer
button-download-title: Download file with test to local computer
button-save-title: Save file with test to data storage
button-saveas-title: Save as new filename with test to data storage
create-test-path-description: The test will be create in the path
result-instruction: Click on the test in right panel and see detail of results on the left. You may generate and download CSV, merge results from multiple tests. Click on select button to choose tests for merging.
select-deselect-all-results: Click to select/deslect all results for merge
export-csv-detail: Comma Separated Value format, separator is `|`
perform-loading: Test is being loaded and prepared ...
button-finalize: NEXT to finish and save the results
psychotest-row-screen: We recommend to switch browser to fullscreen mode, e.g. using F11 button on your keyboard.
psychotest-row-buttons1: In order to start test, press the button
psychotest-row-buttons2: bellow. At the end of the test, you need to finish by pressing the button:
finalize-row1: Thank you for completing the test.
finalize-saving-long: Saving results takes too long. Download a copy of results using buttons bellow:
finalize-save-local: The results was not saved. Download a copy of results using buttons bellow:
finalize-result-can-be-downloaded: Copy of results might be downloaded using buttons bellow:
finalize-repeat: To repeat the same test click
finalize-close: To finish this session, you may close this browser window.
url-performtest: URL to perform test, common introductory screen is shown at first
url-directtest: URL to directly go into test without introductory screen
